text: @toryboypierce @COVID19 @MattHancock I am sick of all the blame shifting, let's just all pull together and get to the other side. We are all in a situation we didnt expect to be in. Hell 4 months ago the only pandemic I knew was in films. I can't listen to it anymore, until a vaccine, I am at risk I need peace.
